meanings.sent1: Meseemed the sun was shining brightly.
meanings.sent2: It meseemed the cat was sleeping peacefully.
meanings.sent3: As I walked, meseemed the trees were whispering secrets.
meanings.sent4: In the quiet night, meseemed the stars were singing a lullaby.
meanings.sent5: When I closed my eyes, meseemed I could hear the flowers blooming.

meanings.sent2: It meseemed the birds were chirping happily.
meanings.sent3: During the play, meseemed the actors were dancing clumsily.
meanings.sent4: In the distance, meseemed the mountains were calling my name.
meanings.sent5: As I gazed out the window, meseemed the world was full of possibilities.
